title: No Credit Checks, Close to Strip, Cable and WiFi Included
posting_body: ['Twain Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-On Las Vegas RTC bus line', '-Easy freeway access', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Walk to Las Vegas Strip', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
